relationship_LoveOfTheirLife.russian: Любит %hisHer% так же, как свою жизнь

relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.english:
%affectedName% is upset with %partnerName%. %cap-heShe% will not talk to %2-himHer% for some time.
(%seconds% seconds left)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.german:
%affectedName% ist sauer auf %partnerName%. %cap-erSie% wird für eine Weile nicht mit %2-ihmIhr% sprechen.
(%seconds% Sekunden übrig)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.french:
%affectedName% est en colère contre %partnerName%. %cap-ilElle% ne lui parlera pas pendant un certain temps.
(%seconds% secondes restantes)
relationshipEffect_Upset_Description.russian:
%affectedName% обижен%surnameA% на %partnerName%. %cap-heShe% не будет разговаривать с %heShe2% некоторое время.
(%seconds% секунд осталось)

relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.english:
%affectedName% is impressed by %partnerName%. Any positive interaction is twice as effective!
(%seconds% seconds left)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.german:
%affectedName% ist beeindruckt von %partnerName%. Jede positive Interaktion ist doppelt so effektiv!
(%seconds% Sekunden übrig)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.french:
%affectedName% est impressionné%e% par %partnerName%. Toute interaction positive est deux fois plus efficace !
(%seconds% secondes restantes)
relationshipEffect_Impressed_Description.russian:
%affectedName% впечатлен %partnerName%. Любое положительное взаимодействие станет в два раза эффективнее!
(%seconds% секунд осталось)

relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.english:
%affectedName% is not impressed by %partnerName%. Any negative interaction is twice as detrimental!
(%seconds% seconds left)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.german:
%affectedName% ist nicht beeindruckt von %partnerName%. Jede negative Interaktion ist doppelt so schlecht!
(%seconds% Sekunden übrig)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.french:
%affectedName% n'est pas impressionné%e% par %partnerName%. Toute interaction négative est deux fois plus néfaste !
(%seconds% secondes restantes)
relationshipEffect_NotImpressed_Descript.russian:
%affectedName% не впечатлен %partnerName%. Любое негативное взаимодействие станет в два раза сильнее!
(%seconds% секунд осталось)
